amendment.description: To modify the provisions relating to revenue.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3582, under the order of 7/23/2014, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 71 - 26. Record Vote Number: 244.

action.text: Amendment SA 3582 proposed by Senator Wyden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3582, under the order of 7/23/2014, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 71 - 26. Record Vote Number: 244.
